author: remyroy
content: We are looking on building the UI for consolidation, user-triggered withdrawal and user-triggered exit. Where can we find the related contracts, the ABI and the deployed address on Mekong, devnet5 and the upcoming devnet6?

author: parithosh
content:
code and addresses can be found here: https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-genesis-generator/blob/master/apps/el-gen/genesis_geth.py#L107

source code here: https://github.com/lightclient/sys-asm/tree/main/src (everything is in ASM)

author: remyroy
content: Can you make me a devnet5 and devnet6 millionaire? `0x537e0C85Ca9fD164B2f28cf4992420b53Fe65D02` This is meant to test the UI we are building for these new staking features started from the execution layer (consolidation, withdrawal, exit).
